references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of priority queues, which is the central data structure of the main paper.

references.paper_title: Competitive caching with machine learned advice
references.reason: This paper introduces the framework of learning-augmented algorithms, which is the basis for the main paper's approach.

references.paper_title: Improving online algorithms via ML predictions
references.reason: This paper further develops the learning-augmented algorithms framework, providing a theoretical foundation for the main paper's work.
This paper directly addresses the problem of sorting with predictions, which is closely related to the main paper's focus on priority queues.
This paper explores a prediction model similar to the one used in the main paper, providing insights into the effectiveness of rank predictions.
